Legal Area

Mining, Oil and Gas

  • Home
  • Practice Areas
  • Mining, Oil and Gas
Categories

  • All Practice Areas

  • Corporate Law

  • International Trade Law

  • Business Law

  • Criminal Law

  • Government Affairs

Overview:
After agriculture, Afghanistan is globally known for its natural resources. This sector which requires the involvement of different types of entities and enterprises, including countries’ governments “renewable energy producers, suppliers, distributors, manufacturing, real estate developers and lenders, energy consumers, and energy investors” has attracted not only local but foreign attention. Federal Law Firm’s experts are perfectly capable to assist and advise local and foreign individuals and entities about energy and natural resources regulations, transactions, and litigation. We believe in the bigger picture. Professionalism does not summarize only the understanding of local laws and international covenants; it also covers our effort to know “our clients, business model, financial position and long-term aspirations.” Besides, legal skills are not the only benefit that we present to our clients. We have a strong professional relationship with high-rank officials in the legislative, judiciary, and executive branches of government which “facilitate communication, ensure fair consideration, and often enable us to reach out directly to resolve potential issues quickly.”

federal law firm

We look forward to getting to know you and to helping you take your company to new heights.
